text: Misery before baby? Bradley Cooper ‘ s recent malaise about his pregnant baby mama and wife - to - be Irina Shayk have sparked worries that their engagement could be on the rocks. As the stunning model, 31, and her actor fiancé, 42, prepare to welcome their first child, a source close to the couple told RadarOnline. com exclusively that the couple ’ s relationship has hit a low point. PHOTOS : Bradley Cooper & Irina Shayk Caught Fighting At Wimbledon! “ Bradley has never looked so miserable, ” a source told Radar about witnessing the way the Silver Linings Playbook star acts around his model fiancée.
